mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McClenahan, John
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Apologizes for placing Tyler's letter about Buchanan in the news section; he has written an editorial of his own in favor of Buchanan which he feels will do Buchanan "[more] good than a partisan article from a personal or political friend"; claims that Buchanan's speech has done a great deal of harm; reaffirms that he will help the Democratic party in the campaign. Autograph Letter Signed
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1856 July 14, John McClenahan, New York, N.Y. to Robert Tyler
